The read external storage permission must be accepted in order to replace your image(s)
Dit is het berichten scherm, je kan
je toestemming geeft om een boeking to doen voor
apartement. Stel jezelf voor, wees vriendelijk en vraag of de data die je wilt boeken beschikbaar zijn
Dit is het berichtenscherm, je kan
de straat die hebt geselecteert matcht niet met de stad/dorp die je gekozen hebt

berichten en toestemming geven voor het maken van een boeking door bovenaan op \'geef toestemming\' te drukken. Stel jezelf voor, wees vriendelijk en bespreek welke data beschikbaar zijn voor een boeking.
e-mail or password not entered in
User not found. Perhaps you made a spelling error in the e-mail box?
Data could not be send to our servers, please try again later

Thank you for registering. We need some more users before the platform can be unlocked on _Date_ and _time_. \n\n If you know of any people that you\'d see using StudentsBed, please let them know we exist, either through WhatsApp, e-mail, smoke signals or by sending them the link that has been copied to your clipboard
apartment hosting is currently restricted to the borders of The Netherlands and Belgium
You need an active internet connection to use StudentsBed
The StudentsBed platform isn\'t unlocked yet, so log-in is currently unavailable
You can currently only host apartments that are located inside The United States. We\'ll let you know when hosting becomes available
According to one of your former hosts you did not behave appropriately during one of your stays, for this reason you have received a warning. You now have
warnings in total. At 3 warnings your account will be blocked for 6 months.
Number of subletting nights left for this year
Thank you for your feedback, the user in question has received warning.
The stay of your guest will or has been ended today. Has at least one of the guests misbehaved themselves in a big way?

We need your IBAN number so we can deposit the earnings you've made from subletting to your bank account. Your IBAN number will be visible to no one else but us, we won't share it with third parties, other users, etc. 

 enter your complete number without any spaces 

 Example: NL44RABO0123456789
Thank you! Your IBAN number has been linked to your account
Do you want to add your apartment details?
has ended. You can rate your stay from 1 to 5 stars and you can rate how
has treated you during your stay with the appropriate emoji
Thank you! Your ratings have been processed
hosting is currently not available in your country or state. Please restart your registration process as a non-host user
This function will be implemented in a later version
This IBAN number is already in use
I\'m going to sublet a room in my living space
I\'m going to sublet my entire living space
wants to book your apartment starting from
nights, your guest will arrive between

Please restart the app and select at least one of the boxes before you click the \'Yes\' button
Your booking request has been accepted, you will receive a payment deposit when the guest has paid us for his/her booking and the stay has ended
We\'re sorry, your booking request has been declined
accepted your booking request. Click \'proceed\' to further the booking process.
Your booking has been confirmed. Have fun in
has been requested to pay for his/her booking. He/she will stay in your apartment starting from
nights with you. We will inform you when we\'ve deposited the earnings you\'ve made from this booking to your bank account \n\n We will hold
in made earnings from this booking as a commission fee
Certain subletting rules are to be followed for a property located in
. To prevent yourself from receiving hefty fines we strongly recommend you to click the link below, which will take you to a web page with info about the subletting rules in your area

Select a city or village by clicking the icon below \n\n (When selecting a particular city or village to find apartments in, please select that village or city directly, if you don\'t do this you want be able to find any listings)

When using the City/Village box to point out where your apartment is located, please select the city or village directly and not a specific location within that city or village. If you select a city or village indirectly no one will be able to find your apartment
when selecting your location in the \'City/Village\' field, please select your city/village directly (I.E.
StudentsBed is currently under construction, please visit our website for more info

Your password must contain at least 8 characters
scroll down and click the \'save\' button to save the changes you\'ve made
info could not be loaded, please try again later

Number of nights could not be retrieved, please go back and reselect your number of nights
Your booking has been processed. We\'ll notify you when the host has accepted your booking request
(We highly recommend you screenshot this page, you can only visit it once) Please transfer the above mentioned amount of money to the following debit card number:

please mention your full name and transaction number mentioned above in the money transfer order description box. Making a payment from a belgian or other SEPA-European checkings account? Look up how to transfer money continentally from your bank, this process can usually be initiated in a few clicks.

 The booking will be made official when the StudentsBed team takes notice of your deposit order and has paid the host their part of his or her made earnings. Having trouble with your payment and or booking? send an email to studentscouchnl@gmail.com and we'll help you out. 

 You will be staying in:

Er is een bug in de applicatie die er soms voor zorgt dat dit scherm niet verdwijnt, zelfs als alle data geladen is. Echter kan een trage internetconnectie ook een reden zijn dat dit scherm niet verdwijnt. Als je denkt dat de bug nu actief is verzoeken we je om de app te herstarten, wanneer je dit doet zal het probleem hoogstwaarschijnlijk verholpen worden (Deze bug zal in een latere versie uit de applicatie gehaald worden)

We verzoeken je vriendelijk om je systeemtaal te veranderen naar Engels totdat je registratie voltooid is en te controleren of de naam van het dorp/stad dat je gekozen hebt wordt weergegeven in de Engelse taal, anders werkt de app niet. Dit probleem zal in de toekomst opgelost worden
You will stay in a room in the apartment
StudentsBed is temporarily unavailable in your country
This image was generated for your registration process with StudentsCouch and can now be removed
\n\3% of your made earnings will be ceded to StudentsBed as service costs, we also recommend you look up how much money per booking you have to cede to your local municipality in tourist taxes

IMPORTANT: Please refer to our subletting regulations document before accepting any bookings. \n\n In order to make use of our platform you are required to find out whether your rent contract legally allows you to sublet your living space. In cases where subletting is prohibited under a specific contract, we advise tenants to contact their landlord with a motivation and explanation that conveys their reasons for seeking the ability to sublet their space, and to not sublet this space without the landlords approval
Will be cancelled, required permissions not accepted
Found a bug? Send us an e-mail describing the problem and we\'ll take a look at it
No listings found for this place. Have you selected the city/village directly?
Please download an application to open pdf files with
We have taken notice of a payment for one of your bookings, this booking is now officially confirmed. You will be staying with
a recent booking has been cancelled because you are out of subletting days
